• If transfer is not possible (e.g. mother very close to delivery) manage as follows at the district hospital:
o blood pressure levels must be kept below 160 mmHg systolic and 110 mmHg diastolic with the use of
quick acting nifedipine 10 mg orally
• If there is still acute severe hypertension after three doses of quick acting nifedipine, the patient needs intravenous
labetalol to control her high bloo
